鹽酸 [ yán suān ]: hydrochloric acid HCl
鹽鹼地 [ yán jiǎn dì ]: saline soil; (fig.) infertile woman
鹽場 [ yán chǎng ]: saltpan; saltbed
鹽湖 [ yán hú ]: salt lake

heisig_chinese_memo: Salt has gotten expensive in restaurants so the waiters closely supervise the usage of salt shakers to make sure no one is being greedy.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Pirates used to make a secret mix in a dish and use a magic wand to turn salt water into soil.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " halogen " and " monitoring ", the original meaning is table salt. "Shuowen": "Xian Ye. From the brine, supervise the sound. The ancients made sea salt at the beginning of Susha. All the salt belongs to the salt." "Zhou Li‧Tian Guan‧Salt People": "The decree of palm salt," With the salt of Pepsi. The sacrificial offerings share the bitter and loose salt, and the guests share the shape and loose salt, and the king's meal is ashamed to share the gluten salt." Zheng Xuan's note: "Shaped salt, salt is like a tiger. gluten salt, salt For those of you who live in the heavens, there is Yan in Rong Salt.” Jia Gongyan said: “Suffering is regarded as a 盬. It is said that it comes from the salt pond. Today’s salt is also. The salt is scattered and boiled for it, and it comes from the East China Sea. "Yan" means stone salt."

" Salt " can mean preserving food with salt. "Book of Rites‧ Nei Ze": "Scrumbs of osmanthus and ginger, sprinkled on top and salt, dried and eaten."

" Salt " also means submersion or immersion of sea water, salt water, etc. Song Fan Zhongyan "Ode to the Ancestral Hall of Zhanghou in Taizhou": "Recommended to the shocking wave, salt the crops, and the sangzi."

" Salt " can also represent the name of ancient music. Song Hongmai's "Rongzhai Continued Pen-Xixi Salt": "However, those who sing poems called "salt", such as Yin, Xing, Qu, and Yin."

" Salt " can also be compared to Bai Xue. The Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Speaking of New Words-Words": "Russian snow suddenly, Gong Xinran said: "What is the white snow like?" Brother Hu'er said: "Salt the air is different.""
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " halogen " and " monitoring ", the original meaning is table salt.
humanum_full_description:
從「鹵」，「監」聲，本義為食鹽。《說文》：「鹹也。从鹵，監聲。古者宿沙初作煮海鹽。凡鹽之屬皆从鹽。」 《周禮‧天官‧鹽人》：「掌鹽之政令，以共百事之鹽。祭祀共其苦鹽、散鹽，賓客共其形鹽、散鹽，王之膳羞共飴鹽。」鄭玄注：「形鹽，鹽之似虎形。飴鹽，鹽之恬者，今戎鹽有焉。」賈公彥疏：「苦當為盬，盬謂出於鹽池，今之顆鹽是也。散鹽，煮水為之，出於東海。云『戎鹽有焉』者，即石鹽是也。」

　　「鹽」可表示用鹽醃製食物。《禮記‧內則》：「屑桂與薑，以灑諸上而鹽之，乾而食之。」

　　「鹽」也表示海水、鹽水等的淹、浸。宋范仲淹〈泰州張侯祠堂頌〉：「驚波薦至，鹽其稼穡，偃其桑梓。」

　　「鹽」還可表示古代樂曲名。宋洪邁《容齋續筆‧昔昔鹽》：「然則歌詩謂之『鹽』者，如吟、行、曲、引之類云。」

　　「鹽」亦可比喻白雪。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧言語》：「俄而雪驟，公欣然曰：『白雪紛紛何所似？』兄子胡兒曰：『撒鹽空中差可擬。』」

從「 鹵 」，「 監 」聲，本義為食鹽。《說文》：「鹹也。从鹵，監聲。古者宿沙初作煮海鹽。凡鹽之屬皆从鹽。」 《周禮‧天官‧鹽人》：「掌鹽之政令，以共百事之鹽。祭祀共其苦鹽、散鹽，賓客共其形鹽、散鹽，王之膳羞共飴鹽。」鄭玄注：「形鹽，鹽之似虎形。飴鹽，鹽之恬者，今戎鹽有焉。」賈公彥疏：「苦當為盬，盬謂出於鹽池，今之顆鹽是也。散鹽，煮水為之，出於東海。云『戎鹽有焉』者，即石鹽是也。」 「 鹽 」可表示用鹽醃製食物。《禮記‧內則》：「屑桂與薑，以灑諸上而鹽之，乾而食之。」 「 鹽 」也表示海水、鹽水等的淹、浸。宋范仲淹〈泰州張侯祠堂頌〉：「驚波薦至，鹽其稼穡，偃其桑梓。」 「 鹽 」還可表示古代樂曲名。宋洪邁《容齋續筆‧昔昔鹽》：「然則歌詩謂之『鹽』者，如吟、行、曲、引之類云。」 「 鹽 」亦可比喻白雪。南朝宋劉義慶《世說新語‧言語》：「俄而雪驟，公欣然曰：『白雪紛紛何所似？』兄子胡兒曰：『撒鹽空中差可擬。』」

Liushutong characters (3)

鹽字的基本解释

鹽
yán
见“盐”。

鹽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》余廉切，平鹽，以。］
亦作“塩1”。“盐1”的繁体字。
(1)食盐的通称。有海盐、池盐、井盐、岩盐等。
(2)喻指雪。典出南朝宋刘义庆《世说新语·言语》：“俄而雪驟，公欣然曰：'白雪紛紛何所似？'兄子胡兒曰：'撒鹽空中差可擬。'”
(3)由金属离子（包括铵离子）和酸根离子所组成的化合物的总称。可分为正盐、酸式盐、碱式盐、复盐等。
(4)姓。《鲁国先贤传》有北海相盐津。见《广韵·平鹽》。
[②]［yàn］
［《廣韻》以贍切，去豔，以。］
“盐2”的繁体字。
(1)用盐腌物。
(2)指海水、盐水等淹、浸。
(3)通“艷”。羨慕。
(4)通“艷”。美好。
(5)古乐曲名。

鹽字的康熙字典解释

【亥集下】【鹵字部】　鹽； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1508第07
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】余廉切【正韻】移廉切，?音閻。【說文】鹹也。古宿沙初作，煮海爲鹽，河東鹽池，袤五十一里，廣七里，周百十六里。【周禮·天官·鹽人】掌鹽之政令，以共百事之鹽，祭祀共其苦鹽散鹽，賔客共其形鹽散鹽，王之膳羞共飴鹽。【註】苦鹽出於池，鹽爲顆未鍊治，味鹹苦。散鹽卽末鹽，出於海及井，幷煑鹻而成者，鹽皆散末也。形鹽卽印鹽，積鹵所結，形如虎也。飴鹽以飴雜和，或云生戎地，味甘美也。【禮·內則】卵鹽。【註】大鹽也。【正字通】鹽種類非一，或出於鹵地，或出於井，出於崖，或出於石，出於木。　又【史記·天官書】臯唐甘石，因時務論其書傳，故其占驗，凌雜米鹽。【正義曰】凌雜，交亂也。米鹽，細碎也。　又澤名。【史記·大宛傳】于闐之東，水注鹽澤，潛行地下，則河源出焉。　又白鹽，山名。在四川夔州，南連赤甲山。【杜甫詩】赤甲白鹽俱刺天。　又國名。【山海經】鹽長之國。又無鹽，古國名。　又地名。鹽城，在蒲州安邑縣。一名司鹽城。【史記·秦本紀】昭襄王十一年，齊韓魏趙宋

鹽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鹽字的起名意思

暂无。

salt
Basic explanation of words
salt
yán
See "salt".
salt
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" Yu Lianqie, flat salt, with. ]
Also known as "塩1". Traditional characters for "盐1".
(1) Generic name for table salt. There are sea salt, pool salt, well salt, rock salt and so on.
(2) Yu refers to snow. From the Southern Song Dynasty Liu Yiqing's "Shi Shuo Xin Yu Ling Yu": "Russian snow suddenly, Gong Xinran said:'What is the white snow like?' Brother Hu'er said:'Salt the air is bad.'"
(3) The general term for compounds composed of metal ions (including ammonium ions) and acid radical ions. It can be divided into normal salt, acid salt, basic salt, double salt and so on.
(4) Last name. "The Legend of the Sages of the Kingdom of Lu" has Beihai Xiangyanjin. See "Guangyun·Pingyan".
[②]［yàn］
["Guang Yun" cuts with support, goes to Yan, with. ]
Traditional characters for "盐2".
(1) Pickled with salt.
(2) Refers to submergence or immersion in sea water, salt water, etc.
(3) Through "yan". envy.
(4) Through "yan". Beautiful.
(5) The name of the ancient music.
salt
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 2】【halogen word department】　yan; Kangxi strokes: 24; page number: page 1508 page 07
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Yu Lianqie [Zheng Yun] Move Lianqie,? Yin Yan. [Said Wen] Salty too. Gusu sand was first made, and the sea was boiled for salt. The salt pond in Hedong has 51 li, Guangqi li, and Zhou Bailili. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Salt Man】The decree of palm salt is to share the salt of Pepsi, sacrificially share its bitter salt and dissipate salt, the bladder shall share its shape and dissipate salt, and the king’s meal shall be ashamed of dissipated salt. [Note] The bitter salt comes out of the pond, and the salt is not chained, and the taste is salty and bitter. Scattered salt and powdered salt come from the sea and wells, and the salt is also scattered and powdered. Shaped salt and printed salt are formed by bittern, which looks like a tiger. The caramel salt is mixed with caramel, or Yunsheng Rongdi, tastes sweet. 【Li·Inner】Egg salt. [Note] Dayan also. [Zhengzitong] The salt is not one type, or it comes from the brine, or from the well, from the cliff, or from the stone, or from the wood.　[Historical Records·Book of Heavenly Officials] Gaotang Ganshi, because of the history of the book, it is used for censorship, and it is mixed with rice and salt. [Justice] It’s messy and messy. Rice salt, finely crushed.　Also known as Ze. [Historical Records·Dawan Biography] In the east of Khotan, when water pours into salt, and sneaks underground, the river heads out of Yan.　White salt again, the name of the mountain. In Kuizhou, Sichuan, Chijia Mountain is connected to the south. [Poems of Du Fu] Chijia and white salt pierce the sky.　 Also the name of the country. 【Shan Hai Jing】The land of long salt. There is no salt, the name of an ancient country.　Also place name. Yancheng, in Anyi County, Puzhou. A secretary Yancheng. [Historical Records·Qin Benji] In the 11th year of King Zhaoxiang, Qi Han, Wei, Zhao Song
